LinkedIn in Microsoft Applications with.name: LinkedIn in Microsoft Applications with Your Personal Account

1127.quoteText: You give other data to us, such as by syncing your address book or calendar.
1127.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
tosdr.tldr: Linkedin can, for example, take all information from calendar, email, places of event, people involved if you synchronize your calendar or email.

5880.quoteText:
We may modify this Contract, our Privacy Policy and our Cookies Policy from time to time.
If we make material changes to it, we will provide you notice through our Services, or by other means, to provide you the opportunity to review the changes before they become effective.
We agree that changes cannot be retroactive.
If you object to any changes, you may close your account.
Your continued use of our Services after we publish or send a notice about our changes to these terms means that you are consenting to the updated terms
5880.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

5882.quoteText: Use your real name on your profile
5882.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

tosdr.case: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

5883.quoteText: Develop, support or use software, devices, scripts, robots or any other means or processes (including crawlers, browser plugins and add-ons or any other technology) to scrape the Services or otherwise copy profiles and other data from the Services
5883.title: no spidering or crawling

tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

5888.quoteText: You can ask us to erase or delete all or some of your personal data (e.g., if it is no longer necessary to provide Services to you).
5888.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

5889.quoteText: Members may go to their settings to make requests. us for a copy of your personal data and can ask for a copy of personal data you provided in machine readable form.
5889.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data

5891.quoteText: With regard to DNT, LinkedIn currently doesn't respond to DNT signals in browsers because no DNT standard has been adopted, as noted above.
5891.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

5892.quoteText:
We may use cookies to show you relevant advertising both on and off the LinkedIn site.
We may also use a cookie to learn whether someone who saw an ad later visited and took an action (e.g.
downloaded a white paper or made a purchase) on the advertiser’s site.
Similarly, our partners may use a cookie to determine whether we’ve shown an ad and how it performed, or provide us with information about how you interact with ads.
5892.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

5893.quoteText: >We keep some of your data even after you close your account.
5893.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

5894.quoteText: We can also share your personal data as part of a sale, merger or change in control, or in preparation for any of these events.
5894.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

5918.quoteText: A worldwide, transferable and sublicensable right to use, copy, modify, distribute, publish and process, information and content that you provide through our Services and the services of others, without any further consent, notice and/or compensation to you or others
5918.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

tosdr.case: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
